name: Take me home (SeasonsGames)
description:
The game aims to convey two main concepts: the fear of what is unfamiliar or familiar to us and the idea that we can feel refugees wherever we are, as long as there is a loved one with us.

Creators:

This was made for Malaga Jam Weekend 9 & Global Game Jam
